outputs.output_descr: Remove key barriers to the increased utilization of renewable energy for local energy supply, through (i) addressing the legal and regulatory barriers in order to provide fair and competitive access to the market for renewable energy producers, to ensure the collection of payments and to encourage investments into renewable energy; ii) by introducing and leveraging financing for a pilot renewable energy fund/credit line so as to overcome the key financial barriers in Georgia, and iii) by addressing the existing public awareness and capacity barriers so as to provide a basis for the general development and  implementation of renewable energy projects.

project_descr: PIMS 1277 CC FP - Promoting the Use of Renewable Energy Resources for Local Energy Supply
